plot: A new fanzine event is going to be celebrated in a termal fountain, so Kazuki & co. are heading there. But there, when Taishi touches a strange Multi statue, they end up in a cave, discovering a new adventure that involves the ruins of an ancient fanzine place and the story of mankind of the fanzines' point of view
opening_theme: "君のままで (Kimi no Mama de)" by Emi Motoda
ending_theme: "形のない街を目指して (Katachi no Nai Machi wo Mezashite)" by Kaya
